name: getFolderExplorationInfo

type.rawType: (webPages: import("/Users/king/King/operations/tools/types/webpage-types/build/types").WebPage<any>[], queryPath: string, projectRoot: string) => Promise<{ title: string | undefined; description: string | null; descriptionProjectRelativeMarkdownPath: string | null; children: { projectRelativeMarkdownPath: string | null; title: string; firstParagraph: string | null; folderName: string; }[]; }>

description:
Gets exploration information about a folder

- reads README.md in current folder
- reads OPERATION.md in child folders, or README.md if that doesn't exist
- gets an intro from those markdown files and returns that (uses `getMarkdownIntro`)
